headline: Stablecoin Market Exceeds $280B, Shifts to “Infrastructure War:” Report
summary: Alchemy Pay and Gate Research released a comprehensive report on Oct. 31 detailing the stablecoin market’s evolution into what researchers call an “infrastructure competition” phase. The report documented market capitalization exceeding $280 billion as of August 2025, with the sector entering an “Age of Compliance” driven by new regulatory frameworks. ...

headline: MasterCard seeing ‘healthy’ consumer and business spending
summary: Says labor markets remain well-balanced. Says will be exclusive partner of Nubank cards in U.S. Says company’s first agentic transaction occurred in Q3. Says small businesses remain a top priority. Says stablecoins are an attractive, growing opportunity for the company’s network. Says fundamentals of the business are strong. Comments taken from Q3 earnings conference call. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news. Try Now>> See Insiders
